duties_responsibilities.duty: Create and develop visual content across graphic design, photography, branding, UI/UX/web, campaign development, package design, 3D/CGI, and motion.
Lead the development and presentation of content creation briefs for new product launches.
Manage the production of assets across multiple mediums.
Develop and maintain visual brand guidelines for all assets.
Plan and execute campaign photo and video shoots, and 3D production.
Collaborate with internal and external teams for asset creation.
Execute creative from concept to final delivery.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Art, Design, or related field (Master's preferred)
